patients.name: Sarah M.
patients.quote: Finding out I was APOE4 positive felt like being handed a ticking time bomb.
patients.background: Marketing executive, learned status through genetic testing

patients.name: Robert K.
patients.quote: The hardest part isn't knowing - it's the helplessness. It's exhausting living with that kind of anxiety.
patients.background: Software engineer, family history of early-onset Alzheimer's

patients.name: Jennifer L.
patients.quote: Sometimes I wonder if knowing so early was a blessing or a curse.

patients.name: Michael P.
patients.quote: I spent months in a deep depression after getting my results. It's like mourning a future that might never happen now.
patients.background: Teacher, discovered status through research study participation

patients.name: Lisa R.
patients.quote: When my husband got his results, our retirement plans changed overnight.
